name: Old Site
description:
"Old Site" is a mod of Celeste Classic, originally created by Matt Thorson and Noel Berry, using ideas from the chapter "Old Site" from the full release of Celeste Classic, Celeste.

Controls:

Jump with C, Z, or N.

Dash with X, V, or M.

Enable or disable screenshake with E (disabled by default).

Gamepad is also supported, but only on the standalones.
